infos.value: Activates at beginning of battle: recovers AP of allies with a Sword (Warrior etc.)/Sword (Knight etc.)/Axe/Dagger/Ninja Blade-equippable Main Job & lowers AP Consumption for 5 turns & bestows Beast Killer.
Recovers a set percentage of HP (M) when the HP of an ally with a Sword (Warrior etc.)/Greatsword/Gun-equippable Main Job falls below 50% & removes Paralysis/Stop/Disable (1 time per party).
Raises CT (M) when the HP of an ally with a Bow/Fists/Katana/Staff (Black Mage etc.)-equippable Main Job falls below 50% & recovers AP (1 time per party).
Activates at beginning of battle: raises ATK/MAG/Elemental Chain Res of allies with a Spear/Fists/Dagger/Ninja Blade/Gloves-equippable Main Job for 5 turns.

Activates at beginning of battle: raises Pierce Attack/Critical Evasion Rate/Max HP of allies with a Greatsword/Spear/Staff (Black Mage etc.)-equippable Main Job for 5 turns & recovers the amount of HP raised.

Bestows Regen for 3 turns when the HP of an ally with a Sword (Warrior etc.)/Greatsword/Staff (Black Mage etc.)-equippable Main Job falls below 70% & raises Healing Power for 3 turns (1 time per unit).
Activates at beginning of battle: raises Light unit ally's ATK/Slash Attack for 5 turns & lowers AP Consumption for 5 turns.
Bestows Haste for 3 turns when the HP of an ally with a Sword (Red Mage etc.)/Bow/Gun/Gloves-equippable Main Job falls below 50% & raises Reaction Block Rate (1 time per party).
